text: [Music]
uh the any kind of writing um
non-fiction or fiction is is a struggle
it's a it's a very you know moment to
moment struggle figuring out the the
right word the right sentence the right
paragraph the right page the right
structure for the larger thing and when
you're writing a book as my my two
novels have been 600 odd pages that's
there there's a you know that becomes an
enormous uh structure um to to try to to
try to get as right as possible so
that's it's a it's a pleasurable
struggle when you're done but it's it is
a struggle while it's going on I I
actually find the the the the work of
writing fiction less of a struggle less
of a of a
stressful uh procedure than I do writing
a 1700w essay that to me is the the the
essay is or or journalism really is all
is is sort of is almost pure struggle uh
and then I'm only happy when I'm done
whereas fiction actually writing fiction
has moments of of pleasure amid the
struggle while it's while I'm writing
it
